segments.text: In foreign trade , exporters have to adjust their product in a timely manner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Exporters must ensure that their product satisfies customers ' needs , wants and likes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ah , some products are successful at home , but not be popular overseas .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's because the fashion , taste and social customs and so on vary considerably .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sometimes the differences are great .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , we should be in accordance with national conditions and adjust the product .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have to ensure that the product should be attractive to guarantee sales .
segments.speaker: S2
